Title: This game is really fun and addictive!
Content: This game got me really into the Pok√©mon TCG and made opening packs more accessible to me and you should download it. (Also check out Pok√©mon go)

Title: Really Random? Please‚Ä¶
Content: Fun game when you play all solo levels until you get to the expert level. Your Programming intentionally waits to draw all needed cards toward the end of the deck when I need them. I understand needing to raise the difficulty, but keep the player‚Äôs deck actually random, and you can continue to manipulate the opponents deck for it to reach their evolutions right away as usual üòÇ. I should really give this game 2 stars, but I like pokemon. Furthermore, the autoplay feature will purposely avoid making the obvious move for us to cause us to basically lose a turn, for example: attaching a much-needed energy to a bench pokemon instead of the active, which would fill the required amount of energy needed to make an attack. Again, I understand raising difficulty, but come on get real! How about this: stacking our hand with nothing but duplicate stage 2 pokemon, and one basic to start? There are no odds where that should be happening. Before you assume my decks, they are well-balanced and strategic. But what good is strategy if your algorithm constantly sabotages? Do you want return users or not?

Title: Where to start..
Content: Loved this game for the first 3-5 days; didn‚Äôt realize that the odds were temporarily a lot higher for EVERYTHING for the first 3 days, until I experienced the next 30-60. It‚Äôs been that long since I pulled an EX from a wonder pick, or a showcase card for any deck. I‚Äôve won a TON of battle, but with 12 and 14 coin flips, I get ALL TAILS more often than any other outcome. Lol 0/12 repeatedly in one match isn‚Äôt real AT ALL. Odds are fake and stacked in favor of getting u into the game, then never again. Canceling that premium subscription ASAP. 140+ wonder picks with not one EX isn‚Äôt just me or bad luck. lol they just show u whatever card they want y to have regardless of what card u pick. Fakest odds I‚Äôve seen since MyTeam in NBA 2K this game must be owned by Take Two Interactive like all other trash odds games.

Title: Abilities
Content: You should not be able to use a Pok√©mon‚Äôs ability more than once per turn. For example, an opponent should not be able to place a Palkia down and then use Vaporeon‚Äôs ‚Äòwash out‚Äô ability 4 times in one turn to generate 4 energy.

Title: Has the potential to be a great card game, but..
Content:
It‚Äôs a good game; it has so much potential to be the best card game on the App Store, however there are some pretty major flaws.

1. The ‚Äúevents‚Äù are really just the same things over and over. They‚Äôre not adding anything new, just recycling the same thing, with slightly different ‚Äúrewards‚Äù every time. It makes the game seem very stale after a few months playing. 
2. Corporate greed. It‚Äôs not a rewarding game at all. There are no free stuff that the devs periodically give to players, like 99.99% of other free games on the App Store do. Didn‚Äôt do anything for Christmas, nada. You don‚Äôt really get anything besides the extremely limited free resources from missions and events. You get 2 packs a day and that‚Äôs it. 
3. The trading system. It really only benefits people who have multiple accounts and want to trade between those accounts. Why not make it so that we can offer a card, list what we want to exchange it for, and whoever wants to accept the deal, whether on your friends list or not, can accept? Even a global mystery trade option would be really cool, and definitely feasible for you guys. But right now, the trading system is completely useless if you have only one account, or if you don‚Äôt have friends who play the game. 

I don‚Äôt know if the devs are just lazy, or if they just don‚Äôt really care about the game‚Äôs longevity because they‚Äôre making so much money right now, but as of lately, the game just seems like a scheme to make a quick buck off players, without ever adding anything new or trying to make the game better.

Title: Terrible and RNG focused
Content:
Yes it‚Äôs a card game. And card games are inherently RNG, that‚Äôs already a bad thing but to stack even more things on it like a stupid coin flip gimmick that‚Äôs out of your control is outright stupid. Not to mention meta decks rule the game, you can‚Äôt do any deck you want since you‚Äôll just get stomped completely. And to add on to this, dual energies is absolutely terrible despite the game encouraging you with multiple Pok√©mon. At least the cards look nice but there‚Äôs no real
Reason to spend money on this game when you barely get any cards anyways. And stop deleting negative reviews

Title: Neat but Overly Dumbed Down Mechanics
Content: The presentation and the overall card collecting experience is really well done here! That said, this version of the trading card game has been simplified to the point where I think it's a chore to play. The original Pokemon trading card game isn't particularly complicated, so I don't know why they felt the need to simplify it even more for this version, but I don't personally feel there's enough depth left here to warrant what looks to be a really big time sink. If you just want to collect digital Pokemon cards you'll definitely enjoy this, but if you're a fan of the original card game you might find this version of it to be a bit bland.

All I need is this tokens that let you do it every once in a while. None of that other stuff you have to use to trade otherwise the game is very good. I love how you make it so there‚Äôs different kinds of packs and we don‚Äôt to do one also I think we should be thankful that we don‚Äôt have card set before we get to open other packs because if that was true, I would still be on genetics Apex lol good game but you should make it so you don‚Äôt have to wait as long to open packs as the impatient person I am I basically just play Pok√©mon GO all day and wait for my packs lol

Title: Again Pocket is AIDS
Content:
I cannot comprehend how they made a more basic version of TCG but it‚Äôs much worse.
First, the coin is unrealistic there is a greater chance for it to be tails than heads, plus it‚Äôs more probable for it to be double tails than double heads or one head and one tails.
Second, there is no way to go through a players deck, so if you have a crucial card at the bottom of the deck it‚Äôs a sure loss.
Third, the game is all luck based, while TCG is luck base at least in TCG you can make your own luck not like this game.
I can plead all I want but this game won‚Äôt change, so at this point it should only be played to collect cards because if you wanna battle better to play TCG

Title: Trading system is insultingly bad
Content:
the trade system is nothing but a disgrace in this game. it costs 2 different in game currencies + a card of equal rarity. 

1 currency reloads over time. that‚Äôs fine. that‚Äôs enough. you have to limit trades somehow & THAT IS ENOUGH. THERE IS NOTHING ELSE IT SHOULD COST. 

instead, the game forces you to destroy your own collection for the 2nd currency. the game FORCES you to DESTROY your OWN CARDS. just to trade to friends. 

and maybe you think it‚Äôs just the bad cards you have a lot of. NO. ITS ALL YOUR BEST ARTS ONLY. it‚Äôs all your EX cards. that‚Äôs all you can destroy to create the 2nd currency needed to trade. nothing else. 

and maybe destroying 1 really good card gives you enough of that currency to make dozens of trades? NO. THEY HATE YOU. THEY HATE THEIR USERS. 

DESTROYING your BEST CARD will only get you 25% of the currency you need to make 1 SINGULAR TRADE. 

Uninstall. complete incompetence.

Title: Variety
Content: Honestly we just need better options for cards. The game gets stale fast because there‚Äôs only about 15 cards that are worth playing. Most cards are really impossible to play in decks even in their own type of deck. There are 0 fire types with any ability; darkness and metal has 0 representation, poison types can‚Äôt even work together. We need more Pok√©mon being able to self sustain itself in any deck their in. Like Magnetons ability. Stage 2 Pok√©mon are dead in this game and Magneton is the only one useable because of its ability. There isn‚Äôt any room for creativity or imagination in this game.
